word: \93And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly: and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground.\94\93And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven, strengthening him.\94 The conflict is ended; Jesus consents to honor His Father by doing His will and bearing His curse, the consequence of humanity\92s transgression. He was obedient unto death, even the death of the cross. Here was what was involved in Adam\92s disobedience and what the obedience of the Son of God means to us. . . .
